resources.string: Choose a picture chart to load
GPS is disabled on this device. Do you want to enable it for navigation?
Describe the place under the cross hair, then select one of the presented options to tag it
Describe the place, then select one of the presented options to go to it
Put the cross hair on a known place of the loaded chart, then press the Tag button
You have tagged a place on the chart, now repeat the process to tag one more place geographically well away from the first place
You have tagged the chart, and it is now ready for navigation
Tagging failed. Please repeat, making sure that the two tagged places are well apart geographically
This chart is not Geo. tagged. Please Geo. tag it first from the Tag Chart screen, so your position on it can be shown
Your GPS location is beyond this chart dimensions
